1 /**
  2  * prevent the default value of 
  3  * @param {Object} target the object on which we prevent undefined
  4  * @return {Object} the proxy
  5  */
  6 function preventUndefinedProperties(target){
  7 	console.assert(Proxy.create !== 'function', 'harmony proxy not enable. try chrome://flags or node --harmony')
  8 	return Proxy.create({
  9 		get	: function(proxy, name){
 10 			console.assert( target[name] !== undefined, 'property '+name+' undefined' )
 11 			return target[name]
 12 		},
 13 	})
 14 	return proxy
 15 }
 16 
 17 preventUndefinedProperties.available	= typeof(Proxy) !== 'undefined' && typeof(Proxy.create) === 'function'
 18 
 19 // export the class in node.js - if running in node.js
 20 if( typeof(window) === 'undefined' )	module.exports	= preventUndefinedProperties;
 21
